name: Looply
description:
Addictive and minimalist game.
You should avoid black balls by moving the white ball from right to left on the five-point line.
Reach the highest score by collecting all the green (1 point) or blue (2 points) squares. You do not leave to pass the squares (only "X" squares).

You lose:
- If the white ball collides with the black balls.
- if green or blue squares pass "X" times.

Enjoy it!!!
